0: You can check the body's pulse - R on a person's hand or neck
1: Food speeds up the body's recovery of stamina, blood, etc.
2: Bandages can be used as a splint
3: More than 1/5 of a syringe of fentanyl will kill you
4: If you see a can of fish, you might be mistaken...
5: Don't use all the medicine in the first aid kit, it can only make things worse
6: Join our Discord server, it has a lot of useful information
7: If a person is acting suspiciously, it's not really a reason to kill
8: Reading item descriptions is very useful
9: Sometimes shooting the torso or stomach is more useful than the head
10: All binds on the Discord server
12: If you fall to the ground, you still Alive, fake in console to get up
13: If someone asks you to lie down on the floor, don't do it.
14: Proper medical care increases your karma
15: The doctor doesn't break ribs during CPR.
17: Don't kick everyone, you'll lose your innocence
18: Don't forget about the other classes of Traitor, variety is the best part of the game
19: When playing as a Traitor, don't use only a knife/gun
20: Sometimes it's better to hit someone with a gun butt than to shoot them
21: Harming other makes you lose Innocence, losing it means others can harm you without losing karma
22: Make sure to check if they're truly dead
23: RP isnt required, but nice for a more enjoyable time on the server
24: Kill yourself in front of everyone for comedy
26: Adrenaline speeds up blood recovery, while also letting you stay conscious for longer even if you have less than 3l of blood
27: Adrenaline numbs the pain for the while, but it will always return after it
28: The one and only cause of death is brain death
29: Carbon gas will slowly lower your consciousness
30: Black pixelated noise is the consciousness meter
31: Karma works differently for police. shooting someone is only allowed when you're directly threatened by them
32: Someone isn't breathing? CPR, its ok to break a rib or two
33: You can earn points passively by playing the game to use in the esc menu Pointshop to buy accessories!
34: Inspect your weapon to see how many bullets you have left
